author: Jim Fusilli
title: ‘Boarding House Reach’ by Jack White Review: A Bluesman’s New Friends
text:
On his latest album, “Boarding House Reach” (Third Man), out Friday, Jack White continues to rejuvenate the electric blues. This time, he does so by exploring new recording techniques and adding contributions from musicians outside his customary circle. A delightful reflection of Mr. White’s witty, wide-open mind, “Boarding House Reach” demonstrates what can be achieved by a supremely talented artist who knows not only where his music comes from but also where it can go.
Mr. White demonstrates his respect for blues and blues-rock...
